hero.title: Join {website.name} as a Coach or Team Member
hero.subtitle: Become part of a global community revolutionizing sports performance. Whether you're a coach leading teams to victory or a team member striving for excellence, {website.name} provides the tools you need.

becomeCoach.title: How to Become a Coach on {website.name}
becomeCoach.description: As a coach, you'll have access to advanced analytics, video tools, and team management features to guide your athletes to success. Follow these steps to get started and elevate your coaching game.

steps.title: Sign Up for Free
steps.description: Create your {website.name} account in minutes. Provide basic information and verify your email to start exploring our platform.

steps.title: Set Up Your Profile
steps.description: Add your coaching experience, select your sport, and customize your dashboard. Connect with teams or create new ones effortlessly.

steps.title: Access Tools & Resources
steps.description: Dive into video analysis, stats tracking, and collaboration features. Invite team members and start building winning strategies today.

becomeTeamMember.title: How to Become a Team Member on {website.name}
becomeTeamMember.description: Join as a team member to track your performance, collaborate with coaches, and access personalized insights. It's easy to get involved in any sport worldwide.

form.title: Sign Up as a Coach or Team Member
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below to join {website.name} and start your journey in sports performance.

steps.title: Register Your Account
steps.description: Sign up with your details and choose your role as a coach or team member. No fees required to join and start contributing.

steps.title: Join or Create a Team
steps.description: Search for existing teams in your sport or create a new one. Connect with coaches and fellow athletes globally.

steps.title: Engage with Features
steps.description: Upload videos, view stats, and participate in discussions. Use our tools to improve your skills and team performance.

items.title: Advanced Analytics
items.description: Gain deep insights into performance with AI-powered stats and visualizations for better decision-making.

items.title: Global Community
items.description: Connect with teams and coaches in over {primaryColor1}180+ countries{primaryColor1} to share knowledge and opportunities.

items.title: Video Collaboration
items.description: Share and analyze game footage in real-time with intuitive tools designed for all sports levels.

items.title: Personalized Support
items.description: Receive tailored guidance and resources to maximize your potential as a coach or team member.

items.title: Multi-Sport Support
items.description: Whether it's soccer, basketball, or any of 15+ sports, our platform adapts to your needs.

items.title: Free Access
items.description: Start with our free plan and upgrade as needed for premium features and higher limits.
